title: Isua hming an hril ang a
lyrics:
Isua hming an hril ang a,
Haleluia!
Phaitualah leh thingtlangah,
Haleluia!
Hetah Gospel a thleng ta,
Haleluia!
Chhak lamah a kal zel ang,
Haleluia!

Mi zawng zawng an inkhawm dawn,
Haleluia!
Chhandamtu chawimawi turin,
Haleluia!
Kalv'ri thawina an hril ang,
Haleluia!
Khawvel ram zawng zawngah pawh,
Haleluia!
